The study design investigator-initiated , prospective randomise , multi-centre , multi-national , open-label trial conduct approximately 60-80 interventional cardiology centre Europe , North America , South America Asia-Pacific . Patients randomise 1:1 ratio study reference treatment strategy . Randomisation occur time index procedure prior PCI . Subjects stratify accord centre accord clinical presentation ( Stable Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD ) v . Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) ) . All patient follow period 2 year .
